name: Neon Racer (Darkmode Studios)
description:
Neon Racer is a game where I tried to replicate the android game, rider. But for windows. Its a very short (DEMO) fun little racing game where you have to ride around neon trails and avoid falling off or roll over.

This is only the Demo. if you want me to make the full version, with shops, upgrades and more polishing, Let me know in the comments!
